attributes.action: Bring back hanging for treason to this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the ever increasing risk to our democracy in this country, we need to be clear that anyone who claims to be British and acts in a way that could lead to some form of terror attack against this or other countries should be hung.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Bring back hanging for treason to this country."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11874.asp

Prime Minister's Office
